skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Tashkent, flotilla leader destroyer from the Northern Parliament. There are three other... actually, nevermind. I'm called the "Blue Cruiser" because of my Sardegna-style construction. Of course, I'm a destroyer, and I have nothing against that. I'll put up results just like I did during the Battle of Sevastopol, so look forward to it.
skins.acquisition: I'm Tashkent. Some call me the Blue Cruiser. Another comrade who wants to woo me? It's just about recruitment...? I see. What a hopeless fellow you are.
skins.login: Is it that fun staring at Tashkent? ...Is that so? Well, do as you please.
skins.details: Did you come to watch me practice? ...So, are you staying or what?
skins.secretaryIdle1: I was born in Sardegna, so I'm quite familiar with their cuisine. Well, it's not like it matters if the people here like that kind of food.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Why is so g'damn hot here? Dear comrade, go turn the air conditioning on for me??
skins.secretaryIdle3: How strange... It's not like I make any effort to be friendly or sociable, so why do people end up liking me more? Hey, do you know why that might be, dear comrade?
skins.secretaryTouch: What is it? Oh, you have work for me? Is that so... Fine, I'll take care of it.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eh...? What are you trying to do? Are the puffy balls on my outfit that interesting?

skins.shipDescription: ...*Sigh*, I never thought I'd get captured by these little guys... Dear comrade, does Tashkent really have to play along with this?
skins.acquisition: ...*Sigh*, I never thought I'd get captured by these little guys... Dear comrade, does Tashkent really have to play along with this?
skins.login: Dear comrade, do you really think you can keep me bound like this? ...Is that so? Naive fool. Hehe~
skins.details: Dear comrade, how long are you going to keep me like this? ...Is that so... Ehh? Forever?!
skins.secretaryIdle1: I knew there was something... wrong about that chocolate... I never thought this would happen to me... my head's still spinning...
skins.secretaryIdle2: When I was talking to Zara, she said I look more appealing in this outfit. So... what do you think, dear comrade?
skins.secretaryIdle3: I'm not like Avrora. I can't drink at all... Ah, wait, I'm not talking about vodka!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Wait, I'm not okay with this role reversal! I should be the one touching you, dear comrade!
